des: "This delicious coconut cream coffee creamer tastes just like the one you can buy at the grocery store, only it doesn't contain any of the added chemicals or preservatives."
ins: Combine cream, milk, and sugar in a small pot over low heat until steam appears, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and vanilla extracts. Cool and store in a sealed container in the refrigerator.
